articles.author: Luc Cohen, Krishn Kaushik
articles.title: How alleged India plots to kill Sikh separatists in the US and Canada unfolded - Reuters
articles.description: The alleged plot to assassinate a Sikh separatist on U.S. soil began in May, with a text message between what the American indictment says was an Indian security official and an alleged drugs trafficker.

articles.title: China mourns Kissinger — ‘a most valued old friend’ - CNN

articles.author: Antonio Planas, The Associated Press
articles.title: Mother of Palestinian shot in Vermont says men were victims of a targeted hate crime - NBC News
articles.description: The mother of one of the Palestinian American college students shot on the street near the University of Vermont has no doubt that the men were targeted and says the shooting should absolutely be treated as a hate crime.
